attributes.action: create stricter planning laws for multinational companies building large warehouses near residential areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: multinational companies such as ASDA and TESCO are destroying peoples comfort and enjoyment of their environment by building massive warehouses near to residential areas.  The planning applications are not advertised well enough for people to object to, only when building commences do most people find out about it.
